Flow.description: Display the Account Indications and BWI/CUR Relationships that are currently active.

formulas.description: If the variable set in the flow equals true, the static resource is shown. This can only be done in a formula. The rendering is done in the Display Text component.
formulas.name: forT_BelverbodImage

formulas.description: If the variable set in the flow equals true, the static resource is shown. This can only be done in a formula. The rendering is done in the Display Text component.
formulas.name: forT_BezoekMetTweeImage

formulas.description: If the variable set in the flow equals true, the static resource is shown. This can only be done in a formula. The rendering is done in the Display Text component.
formulas.name: forT_BezoekverbodImage

formulas.description: The indications image for the screen flow
formulas.name: forT_Indications

formulas.description: If the variable set in the flow equals true, the static resource is shown. This can only be done in a formula. The rendering is done in the Display Text component.
formulas.name: forT_SchrijfverbodImage

Flow.label: Screen Flow - Display Account Indications

recordLookups.description: Retrieve all Indications of the Account, regardless of they are active or not.
recordLookups.name: Get_Indications
recordLookups.label: Indications

recordLookups.description: Retrieve all Relationships where the Account is the subsidiary relation and type is either BWI or CUR. The inactive Relationships get filtered out but can still be displayed in the detail data table.
recordLookups.name: Get_Relationships
recordLookups.label: Relationships

screens.description: Show all active and inactive Indications and Relationships
screens.name: Indication_And_Relationship_Detail_Screen
screens.label: Indication And Relationship Detail Screen

fields.name: DisplayIndicatorTitle
fields.fieldText: Indication Details

fields.name: DisplayRelationshipTitle
fields.fieldText: Relationship Details

screens.description: Main screen to display the Indications and Relationships
screens.name: Show_Indications_and_Relationships
screens.label: Show Indications and Relationships

fields.name: Bijzonderheden
fields.fieldText: {!forT_Indications} Indications

subflows.description: Show the generic Screen Flow Error Screen.
subflows.name: Subflow_ErrorScreen
subflows.label: Error Screen

subflows.name: Subflow_PublishFlowFaultEvent

variables.description: This variable is used to store the Flow Element name if a flow errors.
variables.name: VarT_FlowElement
